blocks.name: fh1
blocks.content: Foulis-Holland Theorem. If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive. First of two parts. Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fh1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))), wceq(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))
  syl12anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), c0h))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2)), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)))
  3impb(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh))
  anandis(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c2), cch))
  chjcl(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cch))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cch), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cch))
  chincl(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
  chsh(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2)), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))))
  ledi(c0, c1, c2)
  eqtrd(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), c0h, cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2)), wceq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))))))
  3impdi(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wceq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))))))
  ineq12d(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2))), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch))), wceq(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0)))
  incom(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
  eqtrd(cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2))), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wceq(cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c2), cch))
  chincl(c0, c1)
  chincl(c0, c2)
  chdmj1(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2))
  ineqan12d(cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch)))
  chdmm1(c0, c1)
  chdmm1(c0, c2)
  eqtrd(cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), c0h, cin(c0, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))
  syl6eq(cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(c0, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cin(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))
  syl5eq(cin(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cin(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cin(c0, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))
  inass(co(c1, chj, c2), c0, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2))))

  3eqtr4g(cin(c0, cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(c0, cin(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))), cin(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1))), cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))), cin(cin(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), cin(c0, cfv(cort, c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))

blocks.name: fh2
blocks.content: Foulis-Holland Theorem. If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive. Second of two parts. Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fh2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))), wceq(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))))
  syl12anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))), wceq(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))), wceq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), c0h))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2)), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)))
  3impb(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wa(wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh))
  anandis(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wcel(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(cin(c0, c2), cch))
  chjcl(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch))), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), csh), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cch))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wcel(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cch), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cch))
  chjcl(c1, c2)
  chincl(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
  chsh(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2)), wss(co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))))
  ledi(c0, c1, c2)
  eqtrd(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), c0h, cin(cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))))
  syl6eq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(cfv(cort, c1), co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(cfv(cort, c1), c0), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))))
  eqtrd(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(cfv(cort, c1), c0), cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c1, ccm, c2)), wceq(cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cfv(cort, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(c0, c2)))), cin(cin(c0, co(c1, chj, c2)), cin(co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, cin(c0, c2))))))

blocks.name: cm2j
blocks.content: A lattice element that commutes with two others also commutes with their join. Theorem 4.2 of [Beran] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cm2j(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))), wbr(c0, ccm, co(c1, chj, c2)))
} = {

  oveq12d(c1, chj, c2, co(cin(c0, c1), chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2))))

  3anim1i(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch))
  choccl(c0)
  biimpa(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2)), wa(wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c2)))
  anbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c2), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c1)))
  cmcm3(c0, c1)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c2), wbr(cfv(cort, c0), ccm, c2)))
  cmcm3(c0, c2)
  fh1(cfv(cort, c0), c1, c2)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch), wb(wbr(c0, ccm, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(co(c1, chj, c2), co(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), chj, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, c0))))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cch), wa(wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c2, cch)), wb(wbr(c0, ccm, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(co(c1, chj, c2), co(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), chj, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, c0))))), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cch))
  chjcl(c1, c2)
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cch)), wbr(c0, ccm, co(c1, chj, c2)), wceq(co(c1, chj, c2), co(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), chj, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, c0)))), wbr(co(c1, chj, c2), ccm, c0))
  cmcm(c0, co(c1, chj, c2))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(co(c1, chj, c2), cch), wb(wbr(co(c1, chj, c2), ccm, c0), wceq(co(c1, chj, c2), co(cin(co(c1, chj, c2), c0), chj, cin(co(c1, chj, c2), cfv(cort, c0))))))
  cmbr(co(c1, chj, c2), c0)
}

blocks.name: fh1i
blocks.content: Foulis-Holland Theorem. If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive. First of two parts. Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: fh2i
blocks.content: Foulis-Holland Theorem. If any 2 pairs in a triple of orthomodular lattice elements commute, the triple is distributive. Second of two parts. Theorem 5 of [Kalmbach] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: fh3i
blocks.content: Variation of the Foulis-Holland Theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fh3i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
  -| wbr(c0, ccm, c2)
} = {
  mpbir(wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wceq(cfv(cort, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)))))
  3eqtr4i(cfv(cort, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2))), co(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))))
  3eqtr4ri(co(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c2))), co(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c2))))
  fh1i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))
  choccli(c1)
  choccli(c2)
  cmcm2ii(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  cmcm3ii(c0, c1)
  cmcm2ii(cfv(cort, c0), c2)
  choccli(c0)
  cmcm3ii(c0, c2)
  ineq2i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))
  chdmm1i(c1, c2)
  oveq12i(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c2)))
  chdmj1i(c0, c1)
  chdmj1i(c0, c2)
  chdmm1i(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))
  chdmj1i(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  chcon3i(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  chjcli(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  chincli(c1, c2)
  chincli(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  chjcli(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fh4i
blocks.content: Variation of the Foulis-Holland Theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm fh4i(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wbr(c1, ccm, c0)
  -| wbr(c1, ccm, c2)
} = {
  mpbir(wceq(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), wceq(cfv(cort, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)))))
  3eqtr4i(cfv(cort, cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))), cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2))), co(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))))
  3eqtr4ri(co(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))), cin(cfv(cort, c0), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c2))), co(cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), chj, cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c2))))
  fh2i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))
  choccli(c0)
  choccli(c2)
  cmcm2ii(cfv(cort, c1), c0)
  cmcm3ii(c1, c0)
  cmcm2ii(cfv(cort, c1), c2)
  choccli(c1)
  cmcm3ii(c1, c2)
  ineq2i(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))
  chdmm1i(c1, c2)
  oveq12i(cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c1)), chj, cfv(cort, co(c0, chj, c2)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c1)), cin(cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cort, c2)))
  chdmj1i(c0, c1)
  chdmj1i(c0, c2)
  chdmm1i(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))
  chdmj1i(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  chcon3i(co(c0, chj, cin(c1, c2)), cin(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2)))
  chjcli(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  chincli(c1, c2)
  chincli(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, chj, c2))
  chjcli(c0, c1)
  chjcli(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: cm2ji
blocks.content: A lattice element that commutes with two others also commutes with their join. Theorem 4.2 of [Beran] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cm2mi
blocks.content: A lattice element that commutes with two others also commutes with their meet. Theorem 4.2 of [Beran] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cm2mi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
  -| wcel(c2, cch)
  -| wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
  -| wbr(c0, ccm, c2)
} = {
  mpbir(wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))))
  breqtrri(c0, ccm, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), co(cfv(cort, c1), chj, cfv(cort, c2)))
  cm2ji(c0, cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c2))
  choccli(c1)
  choccli(c2)
  cmcm2ii(c0, c1)
  cmcm2ii(c0, c2)
  chdmm1i(c1, c2)
  cmcm2i(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  chincli(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cm2mi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0[C_H](c1 ⋂ c2)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c2 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c0[C_H]c1
  ⊣ c0[C_H]c2
} = {
  mpbir(c0[C_H](c1 ⋂ c2), c0[C_H](_|_ `(c1 ⋂ c2)))
  breqtrri(c0, ccm, (_|_ `(c1 ⋂ c2)), ((_|_ ` c1)[vH](_|_ ` c2)))
  cm2ji(c0, (_|_ ` c1), (_|_ ` c2))
  choccli(c1)
  choccli(c2)
  cmcm2ii(c0, c1)
  cmcm2ii(c0, c2)
  chdmm1i(c1, c2)
  cmcm2i(c0, (c1 ⋂ c2))
  chincli(c1, c2)
}
